column5: New Improvements! -Brand new queen beds, mattresses! -New 400 TC bedding -Upgraded Internet to Gigabit Fiber -Mini fridge stocked w/ water&beers -In-room ChromeCast for TV -Brighter front path lighting  Large private room with 2 queen beds & ensuite bath in an older home with lots of character. Sleeps up to 4. Includes access to great kitchen, living room & front deck. Close to downtown & East Side bars/restaurants. Off-street parking available for 1 car. Friendly dogs live in the house.
column8: 2 Q Beds w/ Bath close to DT; Great for Summer UT
